info.title: News API For Digital Portals
info.description:
Consume FactSetâ€™s StreetAccount news and 3rd party content through an API that seamlessly integrates with
[quotes](https://developer.factset.com/api-catalog/real-time-quotes-api),
[time series](https://developer.factset.com/api-catalog/real-time-time-series-api),
[watchlists](https://developer.factset.com/api-catalog/watchlist-api-digital-portals), and other Functional APIs.

Search for news articles from various news distributors and publishers. Incorporate a multitude of search parameters such as region, category, source, article type and provider-specific meta data, to easily filter out the noise.

All search and list endpoints can be subscribed to receive streamed updates.

News providers include:

* APA
* AWP 
* Businesswire
* Cercle Finance
* Direkt News SE
* Dow Jones News
* dpa
* dpa-AFX 
* EUWAX
* GlobenewsWire
* Kauppalehti
* MT Newswires
* MoneyAM
* newsaktuell
* OMX
* PR Newswire 
* Ritzau Finans
* StreetAccount News
* TDN News
      
See the [Real-Time Quotes API](https://developer.factset.com/api-catalog/real-time-quotes-api) for access to detailed
price and performance information, plus basic support for security identifier cross-reference.

schema.description: If true, media references are included if available.

post.summary: List news articles of an article chain.
post.description: List news articles of an article chain.

post.summary: News articles for instruments that are constituents of the given indices.
post.description: News articles for instruments that are constituents of the given indices.

post.summary: List news articles which contain media of specific media kinds.
post.description: List news articles which contain media of specific media kinds.

post.summary: Search for news articles using a fulltext search.
post.description: Search for news articles using a fulltext search. All specified criteria need to be fulfilled for an article to match. Each criterion is handled according to its selectionType; "include" requires the criterion to evaluate to true, "exclude" requires the criterion to evaluate to false. A criterion is fulfilled when at least one of its values is found.

ErrorMetaObject.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

ErrorObject.description: The errors member contains additional information about a failed request.

details.description: A human-readable, unstructured explanation specific to this occurrence of the failure.

encryptedDetails.description: Base64-encoded, internal details about the error, in addition to "details".

type.description: Internal error type of the Foundation API protocol.

attribute.description: For a validation error, a reference to the request parameter that failed validation; otherwise, an empty array.

name.description: Element of the path denoting the request parameter.

index.description: If the attribute "name" designates an array, index of the array element; otherwise the special value -1.

AttributesMember.description: Limit the attributes returned in the response to the specified set.

code.description: The HTTP status code of the response, mirroring the code from the Status-Line of the HTTP response message (see [RFC2616] section 6.1).

StatusObject.description: The status member contains the status code of the response.

CursorBasedPaginationOutputObject.description: Pagination attributes for the cursor-based pagination strategy.

total.description: Total number of entries in the result set.

isEstimatedTotal.description: Flag indicating that the value of `total` is estimated.

next.description: The next cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination, otherwise `null`.

previous.description: The previous cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination. If a previous cursor position is not supported or available, `previous` is `null`.

CursorBasedPaginationOutputObjectWithout.description: Pagination attributes for the cursor-based pagination strategy; a total element count is not supported.

next.description: The next cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination, otherwise `null`.

previous.description: The previous cursor position to use in the parameter `pagination.cursor` for an endpoint that supports cursor-based pagination. If a previous cursor position is not supported or available, `previous` is `null`.

OffsetBasedPaginationOutputObject.description: Pagination attributes for the offset-based pagination strategy.

total.description: Total number of entries in the result set.

isEstimatedTotal.description: Flag indicating that the value of "total" is estimated.

OffsetBasedPaginationOutputObjectWithout.description: Pagination attributes for the offset-based pagination strategy; a total element count is not supported.

hasNext.description: Flag indicating that a subsequent request with the same parameters, except that the parameter `pagination.offset` is incremented by `pagination.limit`, would yield additional results.

isPartial.description: Flag indicating that the response is a possibly incomplete array or an object containing a possibly incomplete array, due to hitting a processing time limit. If `true`, some matching results might be missing from the array, or elements for matching results might be incorrectly included (for example, when priority sorting would have removed the element). Depending on the use case, such a response may be unsuitable.

PartialOutputObject.description: Object denoting that the endpoint response is possibly incomplete.

data.description: The data member contains the request's primary data.

filter.description: Criteria that filter the items in the response list; only items that match all of the criteria are returned.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

range.description: Time range for matching the news article's date. At most one of the attributes `start` or `end` may be `null`.

categories.description: Filter for specific categories of the news article. Use a category system of type news with endpoint `/category/listBySystem` for valid values.

regions.description: Filter for specific regions of the content of the news article. See endpoint `/basic/region/list` for valid values.

distributor.description: Filter for specific distributors of the news article. See endpoint `/news/distributor/list` for valid values.

publisher.description: Filter for specific publishers of the news article. See endpoint `/news/publisher/list` for valid values.

language.description: Filter for specific languages of the news article. See endpoint `/basic/language/list` for valid values.

types.description: Filter for specific types of the news article. See endpoint `/news/article/type/list` for valid values.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the request.

minimumInterval.description: Non-negative number of milliseconds to throttle the update rate from 0ms to 5000ms. Set to 0 for sending updates immediately.

pagination.description: Pagination attributes for the cursor-based pagination strategy.

cursor.description: Starting point as returned in the attributes `pagination.next` or `pagination.previous` by a prior invocation of this endpoint, or undefined (default).

limit.description: Non-negative maximum number of entries to return.

text.description: Restrict the response of news articles to given include and exclude text criteria.

selectionType.description: Specify how the criteria should be applied to the search.
x-enum-description: Articles covering the given criteria are included in the result.
Articles covering the given criteria are excluded from the result.

phrases.description: Phrases to be used in the criteria.

minimumMatchScore.description: Minimum match score for words in the news article.

scope.description: Restrict fulltext search to specific scope.
x-enum-description: Headline of the news article.
Text body of the news article.
Search in both headline and body.

criteria.description: Restrict the response of news articles to given include and exclude criteria.

selectionType.description: Specify how the criteria should be applied to the search.
x-enum-description: Articles covering the given criteria are included in the result.
Articles covering the given criteria are excluded from the result.

start.description: The starting point of the time range (inclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the past.

end.description: The ending point of the time range (exclusive), or `null` to indicate that the time range extends indefinitely into the future.

range.description: Time range for matching the news article's date. At most one of the attributes `start` or `end` may be `null`.

indices.description: Set of index notations that each represent an index. Articles that cover at least one instrument contained in one of the specified indices are found.

instruments.description: Set of stock instruments related to the article. The set is not updated in the course of corporate actions, e.g. when the related company obtains a new instrument after a spin-off.

types.description: Types of the news article. A news article is found if one or more of the specified news article types match. See endpoint `/news/article/type/list` for valid values.

categories.description: Categories of the news article. A news article is found if one or more of the specified categories match. Use a category system of type news with endpoint /category/listBySystem for valid values.

regions.description: Regions of the content of the news article. A news article is found if one or more of the specified regions match. See endpoint `/basic/region/list` for valid values.

distributor.description: Distributors of the news article. A news article is found if one of the specified distributors matches. See endpoint `/news/distributor/list` for valid values.

publisher.description: Publishers of the news article. A news article is found if one of the specified publishers matches. See endpoint `/news/publishers/list` for valid values.

language.description: Languages of the news article. A news article is found if one of the specified languages matches. See endpoint `/basic/language/list` for valid values.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the request.

minimumInterval.description: Non-negative number of milliseconds to throttle the update rate from 0ms to 5000ms. Set to 0 for sending updates immediately.

pagination.description: Pagination attributes for the cursor-based pagination strategy.

cursor.description: Starting point as returned in the attributes `pagination.next` or `pagination.previous` by a prior invocation of this endpoint, or undefined (default).

limit.description: Non-negative maximum number of entries to return.

data.description: The data member contains the request's primary data.

searchValue.description: Restricts the search to publishers, which match the search value. The comparison for a match is case sensitive.

matchType.description: The match type that is applied to the search.
x-enum-description: Publisher name must begin with the searchValue.
Publisher name must end with the searchValue.
Publisher name must begin, end, or contain the searchValue.

filter.description: Criteria that filter the items in the response list; only items that match all of the criteria are returned.

distributor.description: Filter for distributors. See endpoint `/news/distributor/list` for valid values.

delivery.description: Filter for deliveries. See endpoint `/basic/delivery/list` for valid values.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the request.

sort.description: Sortable attributes. The sort order is ascending unless it is prefixed with a minus sign, in which case it is descending. A list of at most 1 (possibly prefixed) attribute name(s) is allowed.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for all errors (400 ... 599 error codes)

time.description: Date and time of the news article.

headline.description: Headline of the news article represented as text with HTML entity encoding but without HTML tags.

summary.description: Textual summary of the body of the news article or `null` if no summary was provided by the news article distributor.

body.description: Text body of the news article.

types.description: Types of news article. See endpoint `/news/article/type/list` for possible values.

id.description: Identifier of the type of news article.

name.description: Name of the news article type.

language.description: Language of the news article. See endpoint `/basic/language/list` for possible values.

publisher.description: Publisher of the news article. See endpoint `/news/publisher/list` for possible values.

categories.description: Categories related to the news article. See endpoint `/category/list` for possible values.

instruments.description: Set of stock instruments related to the article. The set is not updated in the course of corporate actions, e.g. when the related company obtains a new instrument after a spin-off.

fsym.description: Instrument-level FactSet identifier of the financial instrument used primarily in FactSet products other than the MDG.

permanentIdentifier.description: FactSet Permanent Identifier for an instrument. The format is six alpha numeric characters, excluding vowels, with an S suffix (XXXXXX-S).

media.description: List of media elements of the news article.

url.description: URL of the media element. The URL is publicly available and hosted by either the publisher, the distributor, or FactSet.

mimeType.description: MIME type of the data of the media element.

caption.description: Caption text that can be displayed with the media element. Empty if no caption is available for this media element.

alternativeText.description: A short description of the media element that can be shown instead of the media element itself.

width.description: Width of the media element in pixels if applicable.

height.description: Height of the media element in pixels if applicable.

data.description: Content of the news article.

language.description: Language of the news article. See endpoint `/basic/language/list` for possible values.

distributor.description: Distributor of the news article. See endpoint `/news/distributor/list` for possible values.

publisher.description: Publisher of the news article. See endpoint `/news/publisher/list` for possible values.

categories.description: Categories related to the news article. See endpoint `/category/list` for possible values.

id.description: Identifier of the news article chain.

instruments.description: Set of stock instruments related to the article. The set is not updated in the course of corporate actions, e.g. when the related company obtains a new instrument after a spin-off.

fsym.description: Instrument-level FactSet identifier of the financial instrument used primarily in FactSet products other than the MDG.

permanentIdentifier.description: FactSet Permanent Identifier for an instrument. The format is six alpha numeric characters, excluding vowels, with an S suffix (XXXXXX-S).

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

name.description: Name of the news article type.

data.description: Details of a news article type.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

data.description: List of news article types, sorted by ascending identifier value.

id.description: Identifier of the news article type.

name.description: Name of the news article type.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

data.description: Details of the distributor.

data.description: List of distributors.

meta.description: The meta member contains the meta information of the response.

data.description: Details of the publisher.
